title: Unintentional ASMR | Noam Chomsky interview on surveillance [Deep, relaxing voice]
description:
An unintentional ASMR video that has been requested many times is a Noam Chomsky interview.
5 hours of Noam's soft spoken voice: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=56MZl-8uano
Hope you find this relaxing. Subscribe to Pure Unintentional ASMR to help our unintentional ASMR collection grow: https://goo.gl/QLm8Qw

Edited by http://ineedtosleepnow.com this is an interview with Noam Chomsky from 2014 where he is interviewed by Juan Branco. This video has been edited and is only half the length of the full interview as the audio quality isn't great in the first half. To see the full video check below. 

Full video: https://youtu.be/8ED1Xt3IoRc
Juan Branco's channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMOrzCo7Jdp6qqEX24CXuog

If you listen to ASMR to help you sleep then these headband-sleep headphones are literally perfect: https://bit.ly/2YrrKQC

This channel focuses primarily on soft speaking, calm softly spoken voices, unintentional ASMR interviews, relaxing voices, ASMR tingles and anything that helps you sleep.
